math.alttext: \rho({\bf R},{\bf R^{\prime}};\beta)=\left|\begin{array}[]{ccc}\rho_{1}({\bf r% }_{1},{\bf r}^{\prime}_{1};\beta)&\ldots&\rho_{1}({\bf r}_{N},{\bf r}^{\prime}% _{1};\beta)\\ \ldots&\ldots&\ldots\\ \rho_{1}({\bf r}_{1},{\bf r}^{\prime}_{N};\beta)&\ldots&\rho_{1}({\bf r}_{N},{% \bf r}^{\prime}_{N};\beta)\end{array}\right|\quad.
